EmailTemplate.name: 17.IPRout.Energy.Utility.T.E.E.15271.EUTC 2017 Eblast.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us at EUTC 2017 - Lisboa, Portugal, 19-22 September
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> JOIN US AT EUTC 2017 SANA Lisboa Hotel, Lisboa - Portugal 19-22 September
Let's explore at the Nokia stand:
- New learnings from transitioning operations from TDM & SDH to packet networks
- What a private LTE network can do for distribution as part of your IoT plan; and see the new 7705 SAR-Hm wireless router and tool to quantify this solution’s financial impact
- New security options for multi-vendor IT and OT environments - Learn about successful NB-IoT deployments
Please schedule discussions in advance with Dominique Verhulst <[[mailto:dominique.verhulst@nokia.com]]>.
For information on Nokia solutions, please visit our website: smart grid solutions <[[https://www.alcatel-lucent.com/power-utilities/smart-grid]]>.
EUTC 2017 programme and registration: www.eutc.org <[[http://www.eutc.org/]]> Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
